remarks: A theorem used in elimination of disjoint variable restriction on ` x ` and ` y ` by replacing it with a distinctor ` -. A. x x = z ` . (Contributed by NM, 15-May-1993.)  Proof is based on ~ wl-sbalnae now. See also ~ sbal1 .  (Revised by Wolf Lammen, 25-Jul-2019.) (Proof modification is discouraged.)  (New usage is discouraged.)
statement:
wl-sbal1 $p |- ( -. A. x x = z -> ( [ z / y ] A. x ph <-> A. x [ z / y ] ph ) ) $.
$d x y $.
